name: Frankenstein Pet
description:
You are lonely looking for something to fill that void in your heart. Why not follow in Dr. Frankenstein’s shoes and make your own pet!

Build your new pet from the discarded parts of others peoples pets. Step 1: Find pieces floating down the river. Step 2: Put your pieces together to make a pet that can survive. Step 3: Bring your new pet to life. Step 4: Put your pet into the arena to solidify its survival!
